meaning_str.bing:
n. 薄板；床单；纸张；报纸
v. 覆盖；展开；给…铺床单；铺开
adj. 片状的
网络. 工作表；被单；薄片

覆盖；展开；给…铺床单；铺开

床单；薄片；薄板；纸张；一张；帆脚索；一整版邮票；覆盖物；信息表；数据表；报表；一大片；一大堆；一大摊（移动的东西）
覆盖；裹住；给…铺床单；倾盆而下（如雨）；使成片状流动；扩展；成片落下

1.en: Therefore, at every time of clearing, the total amounts on both sides of the clearing house's balance sheet are always equal.
1.cn: 所以，在每次交换时，票据交换所资金平衡表两边的总金额总是相等的。

2.en: At night, hundreds of men and boys sleep in a huge sheet-metal shed like this one, packed mattress to mattress.
2.cn: 到了晚上，数百名男人和男孩子挤在一所巨大的铁皮房子里，睡在挨在一起床垫上。

3.en: As such, brands can be considered just as valuable as any other item on a corporate balance sheet.
3.cn: 例如说，品牌可被认为与公司资产负债表上的其它任何条目同等重要。

0.en: Penny's brain teaser this morning. She and Koothrappali emerge from your bedroom. She is disheveled, and Raj is dressed only in a sheet.
0.cn: 佩妮今早留下的头脑风暴悬念，她跟库萨帕里从你的卧室走出，她衣衫不整，拉杰只裹了个床单。

1.en: The melting ice in question is the Antarctic ice sheet.
1.cn: 这里讨论的融冰是南极的冰盖。

2.en: The tunnel is the last thing on the activity sheet. Hooray!
2.cn: 通道是清单上面最后一项了。噢耶！

3.en: Can't do what? She says take our names off the sign-in sheet and leave.
3.cn: 不能做什么？她叫我们把名字擦掉直接走人。

4.en: But even doing all this after two months, I still didn't have time to work my way up a sheet.
4.cn: 尽管如此2个月后，我连一张名单都没打完。

5.en: Okay, make a contact sheet of these frames as soon as you can. And don't say anything to anyone.
5.cn: 好吧，用最快方式把这些都洗出来，别跟任何人说。

6.en: Honey, it's Christmas Eve. Who even knows you're in there? No, our names are on the sign-in sheet.
6.cn: 亲爱的，今天是圣诞节前夜，谁会知道你们在那里，我们在签到表上签名。

7.en: The tunnel is the last thing on the activity sheet. Hooray! Last stop. All change, everybody off now.
7.cn: 隧道是最后一个需要找的东西。太棒了！终点站到了。全部下车了，现在大家都下车吧。

8.en: The children have to spot everything that is on the activity sheet. A boat. A signal box. And a tunnel.
8.cn: 孩子们要找出活动表格中所有的东西。一条船。一个信号盒。还有一条通道。

9.en: Ice loss to the West Antarctic Ice Sheet has increased by a factor of three on a yearly basis since 2009.
9.cn: 西南极冰盖自2009年起，基于三个因素，每年融冰都增加。

10.en: Okay. How about this? We open on a blank sheet of paper. Under a Mozart fugue, we suddenly see a drop of blood.
10.cn: 好吧。那这样呢？我们打开一张白纸，在莫扎特的背景乐里，我们突然看到一滴血。

11.en: It wasn't even an official sign-up sheet. He printed it himself, and he put his name down on every slot for the next six months.
11.cn: 那甚至都不是正式的登记表格，他自己打印出来在每一个机位都写上自己的名字，使用六个月。

12.en: Here are your activity sheets. The children have to spot everything that is on the activity sheet. A boat. A signal box. And a tunnel.
12.cn: 这些是你们的活动表格。孩子们必须找到这个活动表格上的所有的东西。一艘船。一个信号灯。一条隧道。

13.en: There are charities that I support who wouldn't exist without me. If life is a balance sheet, and I think it is, why, I believe I'm in credit!
13.cn: 很多慈善机构如果不是因为我根本不会存在于世。如果人生是负债表，我认为确实是，那么，我还有盈余。

14.en: If you have any questions, here's the FAQ sheet, or if you prefer the human touch, I do a live web chat called Apartment Talk on Tuesday nights.
14.cn: 如有任何问题，这里列出了常见问题的答案，若你更喜欢人性化解答，每周四晚我提供公寓问题的在线聊天服务。

15.en: Here's the problem. I was clearly signed up to use the mainframe in Buckman 204, and Dr. Winkle just wantonly ripped the sign-up sheet off the wall.
15.cn: 问题是这样，我很明确地做了登记来使用博克曼实验室204室的主机，而温克尔博士却粗暴地把它们都撕了下来。

16.en: The same thing I've been doing for three days. Trying to figure out why electrons behave as if they have no mass when traveling through a graphene sheet.
16.cn: 做我这三天一直在做的工作，想要弄明白为什么电子在穿过石墨烯时会表现得像是没有质量一样。

17.en: Scientists looking at the ice sheet often divide it into catchment basins to better understand how the ice in each basin changes and discharges into the ocean, and it turns out to be quite a bit.
17.cn: 观察冰原的科学家常把冰原分成许多集水区，以便了解各集水区的变化和观察流到海里的过程，结果非常惊人。
